content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generation system at x=-25.0 y=80.5
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at x=-21.5 y=70.5 (connected to boiler)
- Boiler at x=-25.0 y=80.5 (connected to pump and steam engine)
- Steam engine at x=-25.5 y=89.5 (connected to boiler)
- Pipe network connecting all components (steam pipes now operational)

### Iron mining operation at x=15.5 y=70.5
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at x=15.5 y=70.5 (output blocked)
- Stone furnace at x=16.0 y=74.0
- Burner inserter at x=16.5 y=72.5 (connecting drill and furnace)
- Wooden chest at x=16.5 y=75.5 (output storage)

### Copper mining operation at x=-46.5 y=70.5
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at x=-46.5 y=70.5 (output blocked)
- Stone furnace at x=-46.0 y=74.0
- Burner inserter at x=-47.5 y=72.5 (connecting drill and furnace)
- Wooden chest at x=-45.5 y=75.5 (output storage)

## ERROR TIPS

### Entity placement and interaction errors
- Verify entity exists at position before attempting to interact with it (repeated attempts with missing wooden chest)
- Check for obstructions when placing entities (burner inserter placement blocked by furnace)
- Stone furnaces cannot be rotated (multiple rotation attempts failed)

### Power system issues
- Add coal to boilers to generate steam (boiler at x=-25.0 y=80.5 still has no fuel)
- Ensure mining drills have power (both iron and copper drills show NO_POWER status)

### Production chain problems
- Connect mining drill outputs to furnaces (both drills show "output blocked" warnings)
- Add fuel and ingredients to furnaces (all furnaces show NO_INGREDIENTS status)
- Ensure inserters have fuel and proper positioning (burner inserters waiting for source items)

### Pipe connection issues
- Verify pipe connections between boiler and steam engine (initial connection attempt failed)
- Ensure fluid systems are properly connected end-to-end (steam pipes now working but boiler not fueled)

### Inventory management
- Check entity existence before inventory inspection (multiple attempts to check non-existent chest)
- Verify storage container positions before attempting to use them
